title: (In Client) where are the skin bios
body: I scroll through my skins collection that gmhave bios for them and I don’t see them. I’ve been wondering for a while.. where are they?

replies.body:
I wasn't too sure myself (I'm ususally a main-universe kind of gal) but I found them under Collection -> Skins.  They don't appear if you go to the Collection -> Champion route.

* So click **Collection**.  
* Then the second tab, **Skins**.  
* Then search or scroll for the skin you want to read the skin bio for.

Not all of them have a skin bio, either, so don't be dissuaded if you don't find anything for the first few you click!

As an example, here's Baker Pantheon's skin bio:
> He's the armored dough-puncher, the Targonian Aspect
> of tasty pastries. He always wanted to be a baker, and
> now he'll throw down in the ultimate cooking
> showdown.  Put your hands together for Pantheon!
